task.title: How to Operate Gwen: The Basics

taskbody.context:
The basics of operating Gwen are meant to be easy. In three steps, you can be on your way to fast, trusted, protocol-driven medical advice from board-certified nurse practitioners.
Here's what to do:
Log onto virtuwell.com/gwen.
Ask Gwen questions related to virtuwell, your health, or your treatment plan.
Gwen will generate secure, trustworthy answers composed by real-life nurse practitioners.
Simple, right? That's a good sign - we designed it for simplicity. You can chat with Gwen on any browser - desktop, mobile, or tablet - anytime. If you need a little more help, or just want to learn more - read on. We're here for you.
